main: ^Now that things are settling down, I figure it's my responsibility to follow the example you've set.
^You showed us the way through this, Maria.
^You walked the path into the darkness alone. Now we're walking after you.
^I'm going back into town, reclaiming my church. I gather that it's in quite a state.
^Fortunately, I won't be heading back there alone. Some folks from the union are coming along to help, more folk that you inspired.
^We all have you to thank, Maria. And I figure we'll be doing that for the rest of our days.
